項.definition: back of neck; item; thing; term (in a mathematical formula); sum (of money); classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

項上人頭.definition: head; neck (as in "to save one's neck", i.e. one's life)

項城.definition: Xiangcheng, county-level city in Zhoukou 周口, Henan

項城市.definition: Xiangcheng, county-level city in Zhoukou 周口, Henan

項羽.definition: Xiang Yu the Conqueror (232-202 BC), warlord defeated by first Han emperor

項英.definition: Xiang Ying (1898-1941), communist general involved in forming the New Fourth Army 新四軍|新四军[Xin1 si4 jun1], killed in 1941 during the New Fourth Army incident 皖南事變|皖南事变[Wan3 nan2 Shi4 bian4]

項莊舞劍.definition: lit. Xiang Zhuang performs the sword dance, but his mind is set on Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] (idiom, refers to plot to kill Liu Bang during the Hongmen feast 鴻門宴|鸿门宴[Hong2 men2 yan4] in 206 BC); fig. an elaborate deception hiding malicious intent

項莊舞劍，志在沛公.pinyin: xiàng zhuāng wǔ jiàn ， zhì zài pèi gōng
項莊舞劍，志在沛公.definition: see 項莊舞劍，意在沛公|项庄舞剑，意在沛公[Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , yi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1]

項莊舞劍，意在沛公.pinyin: xiàng zhuāng wǔ jiàn ， yì zài pèi gōng
項莊舞劍，意在沛公.definition: lit. Xiang Zhuang performs the sword dance, but his mind is set on Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] (idiom); refers to 206 BC plot to murder Liu Bang, aka Duke of Pei 沛公[Pei4 gong1] and the future Han emperor, during a sword dance at the Hongmen feast 鴻門宴|鸿门宴[Hong2 men2 yan4]; an elaborate deception to hide malicious intent
